data.name: Touhou Blooming Chaos 2 - Chara Pack 4:Ibuki Suika/Ibaraki Kasen/Shikieiki/Hinanawi Tenshi/Hata no Kokoro
data.detailed_description:
First, a great thank to all those who have purchased Touhou Blooming Chaos 2, we really appreciate all of you to support us and the development of this game that we all enjoy.
Due to the huge cast of Touhou, we of course wish to bring everyone’s favorite characters into the game. However, limited by many constraints we are sorry that this is going to be a slow process.
As such, we created this series of DLCs for you to enjoy.
Character Pack 4 is all about Gensokyo’sWaifus and the Daughterus!
This includes:
  • Ibuki Suika
  • Ibaraki Kasen
  • Shikieiki
  • Hinanawi Tenshi
  • Hata no Kokoro
...Hope you enjoy!
data.about_the_game:
First, a great thank to all those who have purchased Touhou Blooming Chaos 2, we really appreciate all of you to support us and the development of this game that we all enjoy.
Due to the huge cast of Touhou, we of course wish to bring everyone’s favorite characters into the game. However, limited by many constraints we are sorry that this is going to be a slow process.
As such, we created this series of DLCs for you to enjoy.
Character Pack 4 is all about Gensokyo’sWaifus and the Daughterus!
This includes:
  • Ibuki Suika
  • Ibaraki Kasen
  • Shikieiki
  • Hinanawi Tenshi
  • Hata no Kokoro
...Hope you enjoy!
data.short_description: This DLC is an optional playable character pack for Touhou Blooming Chaos, including Ibuki Suika,Ibaraki Kasen,Shikieiki,Hinanawi Tenshi and Hata no Kokoro. Once purchased, you may use them and all their color palettes in game immediately. Hope you enjoy.

pc_requirements.minimum:

  • OS: Windows7
  • Processor: Intel i3 / AMD r3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
